title: [Initial Listing]  TCOM Global (TCOM) will be listed in Bitget Innovation Zone
content:
[Initial Listing]  TCOM Global (TCOM) will be listed in Bitget Innovation Zone
We are thrilled to announce that TCOM Global (TCOM) will be listed in the Innovation Zone. Check out the details below:
Deposit Available: Opened
Trading Available: 15 August 2025, 13:00 (UTC)
Withdrawal Available: 16 August 2025, 14:00 (UTC)
Spot Trading Link: TCOM/USDT
Introduction
TCOM is the world's first decentralized IP governance protocol, starting with 65 classic IPs from Japan's "God of Manga" Osamu Tezuka, to redefine the creation, licensing, and value distribution of intellectual properties.
Contract Address (BEP20):
0xc23db46993f643f1fa0494cd30f9f43505885d84
